text:
Haruki, you'll be fine.
Just give it your all.

This speaker...
We have one at home too.

Ah, it's not as grand as this one...
But I've been looking at this logo since I was little...
So this little one will be singing with me.
It feels like I have a reassuring ally.

...Haha, that's right.
Haruki, you're not alone on stage.

Hehe... Thinking like that, the stage suddenly seems
very bright and shining...!
